name: guessmynumber
description: How to run 1. Clone or download the repo 2. Open project folder in vscode 3. Start your live-server. you can use a live-server extension or you can type 'live-server' in the terminal if you have node.js installed. Either way Start your live-server. **If you do not have live-server functionality, you can open index.html in chrome.
author: Blake Nelson
